lead_paragraph: The film follows a pair of mismatched travelers heading across Canada.

headline.print_headline: A Dog in the Cooler, a Hitchhiker on Board
headline.main: Review: ‘Cas & Dylan,’ a Road Movie Starring Richard Dreyfuss

snippet: The film follows a pair of mismatched travelers heading across Canada.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Cas & Dylan, directed by Jason Priestley and starring Richard Dreyfuss and Tatiana Maslany.
